data.text:
@Trump_ton There’s no test kits so the number of positive tests (and therefore deaths within 28 days) is plummeting… 

The Gvmt learned this trick from ostriches… https://t.co/oWiu4f4Qac
@Trump_ton That's the mobile version. The full site displays differently in a browser.
@Trump_ton If you look at the data tab on ‘cases by date reported’ you can still see a daily figure. Assume same for deaths/hospitalisations.
@Trump_ton Click on All Deaths Data, it is still there underneath
@AlanHasell @Trump_ton I looked earlier and there are still figures for yesterday as well as two days previous, not difficult to find
@Trump_ton Stopped weekend figures I believe hence the alleged "inflated" figures posted yesterday.
@Trump_ton Yes, you missed an announcement. It’s just weekends which are not doing daily, but for consistency they have taken them off the summary.
@Trump_ton Daily cases are still shown on the Dashboard, along with the 7-day trend.
@Trump_ton Daily figures mean nothing anymore as nobody is testing. Hospital admissions and daily deaths - at least that’s comparable
